greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Array read by antidiagonals upwards: for n-th row (n>=0), T(n,0) = 1; for k > 0, T(n,k) = T(n,k-1)-(n+k-1) if this is positive and has not already appeared in this row, otherwise T(n,k) = T(n,k-1)+(n+k-1).
link: Index entries for sequences related to Recamán's sequence
mathematica: T[_, 0] = 1; T[n_, k_] := T[n, k] = If[t = T[n, k-1] - (n+k-1); t > 0 && FreeQ[Table[T[n, j], {j, 0, k-1}], t], t, T[n, k-1] + (n+k-1)]; Table[ T[n-k, k], {n, 0, 12}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 18 2018 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 16 2001
ext: More terms from Antonio G. Astudillo (afg_astudillo(AT)lycos.com), Apr 05 2003
